== INPUT == &UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GROUP# String with Security Groups seperated by ,
== OUTPUT == &UC4RB_SG_OPTIONS# String containing the Security Groups options (-g sg-xxxx -g sg-xxxxx)

row.process: !Define output variable :SET &UC4RB_SG_OPTIONS# = "" :IF &UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GROUP# <> "" ! create parameter string based upon input : DEFINE &UC4RB_SG_ARRAY#, string, 20 : FILL &UC4RB_SG_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GROUP#,",") : SET &UC4RB_SG_INDEX# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_SG_ARRAY#[]) : WHILE &UC4RB_SG_INDEX# LE &LEN# : SET &UC4RB_SG_OPTION# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_SG_ARRAY#[&UC4RB_SG_INDEX#]) : IF &UC4RB_SG_OPTION# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SG_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SG_OPTIONS#, '-g &UC4RB_SG_OPTION# ') : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_SG_INDEX# = &UC4RB_SG_INDEX# + 1 : ENDWHILE :ENDIF
